FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course this module is part of

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: User visible description of the activity

FIELD.NAME: adaptivity_element_intro
FIELD.COMMENT: User visible introduction text. This is a text shown inside the learning element

TABLE.NAME: adleradaptivity_tasks
TABLE.COMMENT: Tasks consist of multiple questions with different difficulties. Ugly table name ('adapt' instead of 'adaptivity' because moodle allows only short table names. This allows longer appendixes to describe the table.

FIELD.NAME: adleradaptivity_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Adleradaptivity activity this task is part of

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: User visible title of the task

FIELD.NAME: required_difficulty
FIELD.COMMENT: higher is more difficult; condition is: equal or higher; null if task is optional

TABLE.NAME: adleradaptivity_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: Individual questions. For the same task there might be multiple questions with different difficulties. Ugly table name ('adapt' instead of 'adaptivity' because moodle allows only short table names. This allows longer appendixes to describe the table.

FIELD.NAME: adleradaptivity_task_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Adleradaptivity tasks this question is part of

TABLE.NAME: adleradaptivity_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: stores relation between a 'question' attempt and a user (looks like the question attempts are user independent)

FIELD.NAME: attempt_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Every attempt started is represented as a line in the question_usages table. question_attemps are attempts on individual questions.
